Package io.github.jgame.mixer

Class Sound

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.jgame.mixer.Sound
  • public class Sound
extends java.lang.Object
    Sound object. Can be loaded from files or URLs See Clip

    • Field Summary

      private java.util.HashMap<javax.sound.sampled.FloatControl.Type,​java.lang.Float> state
      Stores the settings of all FloatControls.
      private java.net.URL url
      The URL the sound was loaded from.

    • Field Detail

      • name

        public java.lang.String name
        String name for the sound. Either the filename or raw url depending on how the sound was loaded.

      • sound

        private javax.sound.sampled.Clip sound
        The raw clip to play!

      • url

        private java.net.URL url
        The URL the sound was loaded from.

      • logger

        private java.util.logging.Logger logger
        Internal logger object used to log events.

      • state

        private java.util.HashMap<javax.sound.sampled.FloatControl.Type,​java.lang.Float> state
        Stores the settings of all FloatControls. Used to restore settings after calling reset()

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sound

        public Sound​(java.lang.String filename)
        Load sound from file
        Parameters:
        filename - File to load

      • Sound

        public Sound​(java.net.URL soundURL)
        Load sound from url
        Parameters:
        soundURL - url to load

    • Method Detail

      • init

        private void init()
        Initiate the sound by setting the state HashMap and returning when url == null

      • tryLoadFromURL

        private void tryLoadFromURL()
        Try loading a Clip from a URL

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset sound and prep it for playing over itself. See play(boolean)

      • getVal

        public float getVal​(javax.sound.sampled.FloatControl.Type type)
        Get the value of a certain FloatControl
        Parameters:
        type - FloatControl to fetch
        Returns:
        value

      • isPlaying

        public boolean isPlaying()
        Is playing
        Returns:
        true if clip is active

      • setVal

        public void setVal​(float x,
                   javax.sound.sampled.FloatControl.Type type)
        Set the value of a FloatControl
        Parameters:
        x - New value
        type - FloatControl to set

      • play

        public void play​(boolean reset)
        Play sound. With resetting enabled, the sound is allowed to play over itself, but it uses more resources and threads.
        • Instead of interrupting itself if play() is called before the sound is finished
        Parameters:
        reset - Resetting enabled (calls reset())

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop the sound. see Clip.stop

      • skipTo

        public void skipTo​(long micros)
        Skip to sound to the microseconds position. See Clip.setMicrosecondPosition
        Parameters:
        micros - Microsecond position

      • loopFor

        public void loopFor​(int num)
        Loop sound for num number of times. -1 will loop indefinitely (any negative number will, but use -1) See Clip.loop
        Parameters:
        num - number of loops
